evidence.text:
ARCHBISHOP WOZNIAK: I did, Your Eminence.
ARCHBISHOP WOZNIAK: Around eleven thirty, Eminence. I would have called you sooner, but... Wozniak shrugs helplessly. Tremblay arriv es just in time at the door.

ARCHBISHOP WOZNIAK: In the name of the Father, the Son and the Holy Ghost. My last confession was four weeks ago...
LAWRENCE: Janusz, Janusz, I’m sorry I don’t have time to hear your confession. There is so much still to do.
